channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Slipper Shop
channel.desc: Discover our Slipper Shop show and keep your feet toasty and warm with our range including designs with hard soles and orthotic technology plus cosy sheepskin styles.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Frank Usher Autumn Edit
channel.desc: It's time to add that touch of sparkle and glamour to your autumn wardrobe with fabulous fashion from the Frank Usher range.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamond Spectacular
channel.desc: Continuing the extravaganza celebrating the timeless beauty of Diamonds. Join us as we view at least 60 truly dazzling designs, ranging from subtle to breathtaking and classic to contemporary.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Finery London
channel.desc: Tune in to see the modern and sophisticated Finery London womenswear range, with a focus on stylish detail and beautiful fabrics to make sure your wardrobe reflects your individuality.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Cozee Home
channel.desc: Up to 50% Off Cozee Home.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Looking to refresh your wardrobe with chic, classic fashion? Get up to 50% off Helene Berman with everything from trend-driven pieces to stylish accessories.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Footwear Sale
channel.desc: A fan of fashionable footwear? Find a new pair or two and save up to 50% on a range of stylish and comfortable footwear in our sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade up to 50% off
channel.desc: Whatever your outerwear needs, Centigrade has it covered! You'll find a wide variety of coats and jackets in different styles, designs and materials - all with up to 50% off.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: EMU Footwear
channel.desc: Showcase of Australian born, based and owned brand EMU that has passionately produced the world's finest premium sheepskin and Merino wool products for over 20 years.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Explore stylish fashion with Ruth Langsford and spread the cost in 4, interest-free. Discover classic basics, vibrant prints and effortlessly chic styles. Tune in and transform your look today.
